description.value: A comprehensive classification of locations and settings where healthcare services are provided. This value set is based on the CMS Place of Service code set NHSN location code system that has been developed over a number of years through CDCaTMs interaction with a variety of healthcare facilities and is intended to serve a variety of reporting needs where coding of healthcare service locations is required. Excluded codes are those that do not represent an actual location where health care services can be delivered, IE: Float, or a location aggregation.
